column4: in the ubuntu forum there is a howto, to get a pdf-printer, should i look for the link?
HOW TO: Set up pdf printer, link: http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=140815    works fine for me
if I go into System Settings > Printers, I can see six printers, including "Print to File" PDF, but I only see the first printer in the Mozilla print menu
you can use pdf for a printer then
